column5: Hi guys, here are the videos I've compiled in the past few months that talks about taking apart a reel, upgrading bearings.. etc  http://www.youtube.com/user/ahlong/videos  for those who're not adventurous to open up their reels or would like opinions on repairs and upgrades, feel free to contact me via PM.
Great post!. Looks fairly straightforward on the chronarch you worked on.
